function sendFile(res, filePath, fileContent) {

        });
    }
}

function hailstone(n) {
	var length = 1; 
	while(1 < n) {
		if(n % 2 === 0) {
			n = n/2;
		} else {
			n = 3 * n + 1;
		}
		length++;
		
	}
	return length;
}
